alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 11:34AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. .The Sheyenne River at Harwood will see additional rises due to excessive rainfall and will remain within Moderate flood stage throughout the forecast period. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sheyenne River at Harwood. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 91.0 feet, MAJOR FLOOD. BNSF railroad line may need to be closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Friday the stage was 89.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 AM CDT Friday was 89.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 90.0 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 84.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
